official_title: A bill to amend section 119(d) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 regarding urban development action grant criteria to place major emphasis on private investment leveraging and job creation, especially for low-income persons and minorities, including the unemployed. Limits fiscal year grant amounts to any single community.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 119(d) of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974.
